our-story.paragraph1:
At Hargile, we're not building a digital company like others. We cultivate a team with complementary talents, where technological excellence meets real business intelligence.

Here, innovation is not done to shine, but to concretely serve the growth of our partners.
our-story.paragraph2:
Our ambition goes beyond products: 

We create lasting alliances, based on trust, co-construction, and shared success.

 Each solution we develop is designed to evolve with your company, address your real challenges, and anticipate tomorrow's challenges.
our-story.paragraph3: For us, supporting your growth is much more than a service, it's a responsibility, and a source of pride.

Each project is an opportunity, 

 to reveal the potential of an idea
about-us.conclusion: Your goal is built step by step, driven by collaborations aligned with our expertise and values. We prioritize projects that align with our key expertise to ensure progressive, coherent, and sustainable development, without compromising on quality.

digital-audit.title: A performing website is much more than
digital-audit.description:
Is your website generating enough traffic? Does it effectively convert visitors into customers? Is your visibility optimized?

HARGILE has developed an online performance analysis tool. By simply entering a website URL, you get a precise diagnosis in seconds:

features.speed: âœ… Loading Speed â€“ A slow site drives visitors away!
features.seo: âœ… SEO Ranking â€“ Are you visible ?
features.ux: âœ… User Experience (UX) â€“ Smooth and responsive navigation?
features.security: âœ… Security & Reliability â€“ Is your site well protected?

whyImportant.title: Why is this important?
whyImportant.text: because good performance indicators create more traffic, more engagement, and more conversions.

moreInfo.title: The Digital Audit
moreInfo.description: Our digital audit tool helps identify your website's weaknesses and define a clear roadmap to improve its technical performance, accessibility, security, and search engine optimization (SEO).

performance.title: Performance
performance.text: A slow website increases bounce rate and generates frustration among users. It also negatively impacts your organic search ranking. Conversely, a fast site offers a better user experience and improves conversions.

seo.title: Visibility (SEO)
seo.text: A well-optimized site structure makes it easier for search engines to crawl and index your content. The result: better positioning and increased traffic to your site.

security.title: Security
security.text: An unsecured site is exposed to cyber attacks and can quickly lose user trust, especially in e-commerce. The audit verifies the presence of SSL certificates, secure headers, and essential protection mechanisms.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.text: An accessible website ensures that everyone, including people with disabilities, can navigate and interact with your content. Beyond the ethical aspect, this expands your potential audience and strengthens your compliance with accessibility standards.

mobile.title: Mobile Optimization
mobile.text: Currently, more than 50% of web traffic comes from mobile devices. A site not adapted to mobile offers a poor experience and suffers penalties from search engines. The audit evaluates mobile compatibility to ensure smooth navigation on all screens.

bestPractices.title: Technical Best Practices
bestPractices.text: Following the best technical practices ensures that your site is robust, performant, and secure. The audit identifies common errors such as obsolete resources, poorly optimized JavaScript or CSS, insecure libraries, and misconfigurations that can affect user experience and organic ranking. A good Best Practices score guarantees an up-to-date, reliable site that complies with modern web standards.

control.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already on your device and configure most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

cookies.introduction: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us analyze how users use our site.
cookies.title: Use of Cookies

types.advertising: Advertising cookies: To deliver relevant advertisements
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: To analyze how visitors use our site
types.essential: Essential cookies: Necessary for the functioning of the site
types.functional: Functional cookies: To remember your preferences
types.title: Types of cookies used

international.content: Your information may be transferred to â€” and maintained on â€” computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.

userRights.introduction: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your data:

rights.access: Right of access: You can request a copy of your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data
rights.objection: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data
rights.portability: Right to data portability: You can request the transfer of your data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of your inaccurate data
rights.restriction: Right to restriction of processing: You can request to limit the processing

userRights.title: User Rights

audit-results.title: Audit Results
audit-results.name: Name
audit-results.description-performance: A high performance score means your website loads quickly and efficiently. This improves user experience, reduces bounce rates, and positively impacts your SEO ranking.
audit-results.warning-performance: Your performance score could be improved. Let us help you optimize your loading speed, scripts, and assets.
audit-results.description-seo: A strong SEO score ensures your website is well structured for search engines. It means your pages are crawlable, mobile-friendly, and follow best practices.
audit-results.warning-seo: Your SEO score can be improved. We can help enhance your visibility and boost your traffic.
audit-results.description-accessibility: Accessibility ensures that your website can be used by people with disabilities. This not only improves your reach but also shows commitment to inclusion and can be legally important in some regions.
audit-results.warning-accessibility: Your accessibility score needs work. We can help make your website more inclusive and compliant.
audit-results.description-bestpractices: Best Practices refer to modern web development techniques that ensure your site runs reliably and securely. This includes avoiding deprecated APIs, using HTTPS, ensuring correct image aspect ratios, and more.
audit-results.warning-bestpractices: Your site doesn't follow all best practices. Let's address outdated code, insecure endpoints, or minor implementation flaws.
audit-results.performances-good: 90-100 (Good): Your site loads extremely fast, with optimized assets, minimal main-thread work, and reduced TTI.
audit-results.performances-average: 50-89 (Average): Room for improvement in script execution time, image optimization, or render-blocking resources.
audit-results.performances-poor: 0-49 (Poor): Users likely face long load times, jank, or unresponsive pages â€” especially on mobile.
audit-results.seo-good: 90-100 (Good): Well-structured HTML, mobile-friendly design, meta tags correctly used, good crawlability.
audit-results.seo-average: 50-89 (Average): Minor issues like missing meta tags or some mobile usability flaws.
audit-results.seo-poor: 0-49 (Poor): Major problems like missing titles, broken links, or poor mobile optimization.
audit-results.access-good: 90-100 (Good): Complies with WCAG guidelines, keyboard navigation works, color contrast is appropriate.
audit-results.access-average: 50-89 (Average): Some elements are inaccessible (e.g. missing labels, poor contrast, etc.).
audit-results.access-poor: 0-49 (Poor): Major issues preventing use by people with disabilities. Legal compliance risks.
audit-results.best-good: 90-100 (Good): Secure HTTPS setup, no deprecated APIs, good coding practices.
audit-results.best-average: 50-89 (Average): Some deprecated methods, inefficient resource loading, minor security flags.
audit-results.best-poor: 0-49 (Poor): Usage of insecure libraries, unoptimized code, or unsafe requests.
audit-results.may-look: % may look okay, but it still indicates
audit-results.may-look-performances: suboptimal load times or resource usage. On slower connections or mobile devices, this could mean users leave before the page loads.
audit-results.may-look-seo: fewer pages indexed and lost traffic to competitors.
audit-results.may-look-access: your site isn't accessible to everyone. This could be excluding part of your audience and pose compliance risks.
audit-results.may-look-best: a lack of secure and modern web development standards, which can expose your site to vulnerabilities and harm user trust.
audit-results.experts: Our experts can help you optimize your digital impact
audit-results.book: Book a meeting with our team

agves.title: AGVES
agves.description: Specialized sales management application for the education sector.
agves.paragraph1: AGVES revolutionizes school and extracurricular communication through the implementation of a simplifying interface. It improves all operations related to financial transactions and security processes.
agves.paragraph2: AGVES ensures students have access to the resources they need while providing administrators with powerful and efficient management tools.

wallet.title: Integrated Electronic Wallet
wallet.description: Secure payment solution for managing school fees, meals, activities, and other transactions, with real-time tracking.

access.title: Digital Access Keys
access.description: Secure authentication via encrypted credentials or NFC badges for enhanced control of physical and digital access.

communication.title: Parent-School Communication Portal
communication.description: Integrated messaging, real-time notifications, announcement broadcasting, and permission management.

finance.title: Financial Management Module
finance.description: Budget tracking, automated billing, grant management, and accounting exports.

dashboard.title: Ergonomic Administrator Dashboard
dashboard.description: Centralized interface for school data supervision, with customizable indicators and multi-profile access.

i-go.title: I GO
i-go.description: A dedicated mobile application designed for users of personal mobility devices (PMDs) and electric-assisted bicycles (EABs).
i-go.paragraph1: I GO is an innovative mobile application dedicated to electric mobility, designed to meet the growing needs of users of Personal Mobility Devices (PMDs) and Electric-Assisted Bicycles (EABs).
i-go.paragraph2: Born from the observation of the increasing difficulty for these users to find charging stations, I GO offers an enhanced user experience through a comprehensive solution for referencing and locating these charging points through its intuitive search engine.

database.title: Enhanced Charging Points Database
database.description: Comprehensive indexing of charging stations, with classification by type, power, compatibility, and operator.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Dynamic availability updates of charging stations through synchronization with operators and user feedback.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Contribution System
collaborative.description: Addition of new charging points by the community, integrated moderation, and participatory validation.

navigation.title: Integrated Intelligent Navigation
navigation.description: Optimized route calculation taking into account autonomy, traffic, and charging station locations.

community.title: Advanced Community Features
community.description: Route sharing, reviews, ratings, and exchanges between users around electric mobility.

multipass.title: Multipass
multipass.description: A versatile CRM digital solution with modular options adaptable to all market segments.
multipass.paragraph1: Whether you're an ambitious startup or an established company, Multipass offers you a scalable and evolving CRM platform. Designed to adapt to all business sectors, our solution allows you to centralize, manage, and optimize your customer relationships with unmatched flexibility.
highlights: Modular: activate only the features you need
Versatile: suitable for all types of businesses, across all sectors
Scalable: grows with you, at your own pace

modules.title: Customizable Modules
modules.description: Modular architecture allowing activation of only relevant features according to specific business needs.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: Native interoperability with existing information systems (ERP, messaging tools, databases, etc.).

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Infrastructure designed to support increased load and organizational changes.

reporting.title: Advanced Reporting & Analytics
reporting.description: Dynamic dashboards, customized indicators, export, and report automation.

ui.title: Optimized User Interface
ui.description: UX/UI designed to maximize productivity and reduce learning time.
